snippet: The city dismissed two officials Wednesday after concluding that poor preparations and lax policing led to the panic that left 36 people dead.
abstract: Shanghai dismisses two officials after investigators say insufficient preparations and policing was to blame for stampede that killed 36 people at tourist site on New Year's Eve.
lead_paragraph: The city dismissed two officials Wednesday after concluding that poor preparations and lax policing led to the panic that left 36 people dead.

headline.main: Shanghai Blames Local Officials and Police in Deadly New Year’s Stampede
headline.print_headline: Shanghai Blames Local Officials and Police in Deadly New Year’s Stampede
